name: Harrysong
description:
'''Harrison Tare Okiri''' (born 30 March 1981) better known by his stage name '''Harrysong''', is a Nigerian singer, songwriter and instrumentalist who rose to fame after his tribute song to [[Nelson Mandela]] won the "Most Downloaded Callertune Award" at [[The Headies 2013]]. Harrysong was born in [[Warri]], [[Delta State]], Nigeria to [[Ijaw people|Ijaw]] parents but moved to [[Lagos]] in 2007 after spending some of his early life in [[Port Harcourt]].

Prior to signing to QuestionMark Entertainment, Harrysong used to perform at night clubs until he met [[Kcee (musician)|Kcee]] who introduced him to top music personalities. In 2014, Harrysong was nominated in the "Best Pop/R&B Artist of the Year" category at the [[2014 Nigeria Entertainment Awards]] after the release of his chart-topping song "Beta Pikin".
